name: Wibbly-wobbly Tower
description:
Build a tower as high as you can. Be careful with your tower design as things can become quite unstable when you advance. There are only three levels with increasing difficulty.

This is a Ludum Dare 49 Compo submission. Made in 48 hours.

Controls

Use mouse to place new pieces.

Move mouse around the edges to pan the camera.

Mouse scroll to zoom in and out.

[R] to restart the level at any time.
